MSc CS呢啲真係年年都有人上嚟問，但都睇得出唔係人人有心報，我花咗長達五分鐘，上網搵咗六間院校嘅資料，分享畀繁忙而又想讀CS嘅各位

HKU MSc CS
https://www.msc-cs.hku.hk/Media/Default/RegulationSyllabus/Regulations_MSc_2018-19.pdf
hold
(i) a Bachelor’s degree of this University in a relevant field; or
(ii) a relevant qualification of equivalent standard from this University or from another university or comparable institution accepted for this purpose


CUHK MSc CS
http://msc.cse.cuhk.edu.hk/?page_id=136&lang=en
Graduated from a recognized university and obtained a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related fields, normally with second class honours or higher, or an average grade of “B” or better in undergraduate courses; or
Completed a course of study in tertiary educational institutes and obtained professional or similar qualifications equivalent to an honours degree; or
Graduated with a first degree in other fields but having extensive computer-related content;
Applicants with degrees awarded by overseas universities by distance learning or by completing a curriculum of short duration may be required to provide assessment report from the Hong Kong Council for Accreditation of Academic and Vocational Qualifications (HKCAAVQ) on the level of qualification obtained.


HKUST MSc IT
https://seng.ust.hk/academics/taught-postgraduate/msc-it
Applicants must possess a bachelor’s degree in Computer Engineering or Computer Science, or a related field from a recognized university or tertiary institution

HKUST MSc BDT
https://seng.ust.hk/academics/taught-postgraduate/msc-bdt
Applicants must possess a bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Mathematics or a related field from a recognized university or tertiary institution. Applicants with a bachelor's degree in other disciplines must have relevant working experience in IT and Mathematics related fields

PolyU MScIT
https://www.comp.polyu.edu.hk/files/2021-22_MSc_Brochure_201126_web.pdf
Applicants should possess a Bachelor’s degree in Computing / Computer Science, Mathematics, Information Systems, Engineering, or other Science disciplines. Applicants with a Bachelor’s degree in other disciplines with at least five years significant IT relevant work experience will also be considered.

CityU MSc CS
https://www.cityu.edu.hk/pg/zh-hant/programme/p53
• a recognised bachelor's degree in a computing discipline such as Computer Studies, Information Technology, Computer Engineering, Information Systems, or equivalent; or
• a recognised bachelor's degree in a related discipline such as Electronic Engineering, Applied Mathematics, Manufacturing Engineering, Quantitative Analysis, or equivalent, together with applicable working experience in information technology.

BU MSc IT
https://www.comp.hkbu.edu.hk/msc/itm/en/admission.php
Applicants must have a Bachelor's degree in science, engineering, business or other relevant fields.

BU MSc DAAI
https://www.comp.hkbu.edu.hk/msc/daai/en/admission.php
Applicants should normally possess a Bachelor degree in science, engineering or IT relevant fields from a recognized university or equivalent qualification

HKU MA TESOL得一round application，但派offer分三轉派

你之前問競爭大唔大，收4~50個，<10% local，唔知係因為冇local報，定內地生太勁，所以有咁嘅比例

呢科其實睇成績多，相關工作經驗其次(如果有教學經驗，好似報MEd實際啲)，不過啲local同學都係三大BEd(我就冇教育嘅學歷)

另外係睇IELTS，8分就穩陣；仲有，personal statement表達得清楚，重要過你比話畀人知，你識用複雜嘅句子結構

quote.msg: 想問, HKU MA TESOL 會唔會有Second round application?

HKU MA TESOL得一round application，但派offer分三轉派

你之前問競爭大唔大，收4~50個，<10% local，唔知係因為冇local報，定內地生太勁，所以有咁嘅比例

呢科其實睇成績多，相關工作經驗其次(如果有教學經驗，好似報MEd實際啲)，不過啲local同學都係三大BEd(我就冇教育嘅學歷)

另外係睇IELTS，8分就穩陣；仲有，personal statement表達得清楚，重要過你比話畀人知，你識用複雜嘅句子結構
